title: What are your favorite romantic rock songs? - Quora

response.answer_text: Oh, this has to be #1. From the album, ‘Ellis Island’ by “The Paupers”, 1968. I present: “There Was Another Man’s Hair On My Razor”:   Although the obvious choice, I believe it would be followed closely by this tear-jerker, also from 1968, by those troubadours, ‘St. John Green’. It is the self-titled “St. John Green”:   Ah, they were such crooners. And, I’m sorry, but I would be remiss not to include their smash hit romantic ballad, “Canyon Women”. (It was simply too hard to decide between the two of them):   And since the question asks for song(s) plural, how could I possibly not include this live performance by Rodney Carrington of the classic, “Show Them To Me”:   Yes, yes. Quite inspiring indeed. And saving, probably the most romantic, for the bottom of the list, another by Rodney Carrington, “ A Dozen Roses”:   Bottom of the list? No way! Forget that!Oh boy, I’m on a roll now! Woo Hoo! I got lots more. Ooh, ooh, yeah, the classic love song by ‘Da Vinci’s Notebook’, “Camel Toe”:   Good one, eh? Hehehe. Oh, and their other big hit, “Internet Porn”. You’ll love this…uh…one…oh no…no…no, no, no…really?…ohhhh…oh dear…you may have to look it up yourselves… “Hey! You! It’s me. Lori! Wake up! Wake up! You’ve been sleep-writing again. Bad sleep-writing. And this time…Well, I just don’t know what to think. Thank goodness I got to you in time!” Oh, hey Lori. Flotboozle! Did I get carried away? “Almost. But then you always were a hopeless, incurable romantic.”

A2A At my age, there are a few- Tragic - Iron Maiden, Where The Wild Wind Blows  Pantera, Cemetery Gates  Disturbed, Save Our Last Goodbye  Ozzie Osbourne & Lita Ford, If I Close My Eyes Forever   Not Tragic- The Doors, Light My Fire  Jimi Hendrix, Foxy Lady  Led Zeppelin, All of My Love  Warlock, All We Are  Sting, Be Still My Beating Heart  Phil Collins, In The Air Tonight  The Eagles, Seven Bridges Road (yes, this is a love song after a fashion)  The Scorpions, Rock You Like A Hurricane & Still Loving You   Firehouse, Love of a Lifetime  Danger Danger, Feels Like Love  Slaughter, Spend My Life  REO Speedwagon, Can’t Fight This Feeling  Eisbrecher, Ohne Dich  Ok, that is enough. My list could go on for literally hundreds of songs. Up the Irons!
